00037 #include "egs_cylinders.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00041     string XProjector::type = "EGS_Xcylinders";
00042     string YProjector::type = "EGS_Ycylinders";
00043     string ZProjector::type = "EGS_Zcylinders";
00044     string Projector::type = "EGS_cylinders";
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 extern "C" {
00048 
00049     EGS_CYLINDERS_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry *createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00050         // check for valid input
00051         if (!input) {
00052             egsWarning("createGeometry(cylinders): null input?\n");
00053             return 0;
00054         }
00055         string type;
00056         int err = input->getInput("type",type);
00057         if (err) {
00058             egsWarning("createGeometry(cylinders): missing type key\n");
00059             return 0;
00060         }
00061 
00062         // point on cylinder axis
00063         EGS_Vector xo;
00064         vector<EGS_Float> Xo;
00065         err = input->getInput("midpoint",Xo);
00066         if (!err && Xo.size() == 3) {
00067             xo = EGS_Vector(Xo[0],Xo[1],Xo[2]);
00068         }
00069 
00070         // cylinder radii
00071         vector<EGS_Float> radii;
00072         err = input->getInput("radii",radii);
00073         if (err) {
00074             egsWarning("createGeometry(cylinders): wrong/missing 'radii' input\n");
00075             return 0;
00076         }
00077         EGS_Float *r=new EGS_Float [radii.size()];
00078         for (int i=0; i<radii.size(); i++) {
00079             r[i]=radii[i];
00080         }
00081 
00082         // select geometry
00083         EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00084         if (type == "EGS_XCylinders") {
00085             g = new EGS_CylindersX(radii.size(),r,xo,"",XProjector());
00086         }
00087         else if (type == "EGS_YCylinders") {
00088             g = new EGS_CylindersY(radii.size(),r,xo,"",YProjector());
00089         }
00090         else if (type == "EGS_ZCylinders") {
00091             g = new EGS_CylindersZ(radii.size(),r,xo,"",ZProjector());
00092         }
00093         else {
00094             vector<EGS_Float> a;
00095             err = input->getInput("axis",a);
00096             if (err || a.size() != 3) {
00097                 egsWarning("createGeometry(cylinders): missing/wrong axis input\n");
00098                 return 0;
00099             }
00100             egsWarning("got axis (%g,%g,%g)\n",a[0],a[1],a[2]);
00101             g = new EGS_Cylinders(radii.size(),r,xo,"",
00102                                   Projector(EGS_Vector(a[0],a[1],a[2])));
00103         }
00104         g->setName(input);
00105         g->setMedia(input);
00106         g->setLabels(input);
00107         return g;
00108     }
00109 
00110 }
